alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 9:11AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rock Island, northwestern Whiteside, Jo Daviess, Carroll, eastern Jackson and eastern Clinton Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 911 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bellevue to near Andover to Clinton. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Garden Plain and East Clinton around 915 AM CDT. Fulton and Andover around 920 AM CDT. Hanover around 925 AM CDT. Sabula around 930 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Savanna, Elizabeth, Schapville, Argo Fay, Fairhaven, Woodbine, Mount Carroll and Chadwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
